column4: is there a way to host a video on my website without converting to to proprietary formats like .flv? id love to use xvid, but i need to reduce the bitrate. any ideas?
html5 supports certain video formats (non-proprietary), you should check out what exactly it supports.
thanks for the heads up. But would it support reducing bitrates?
not entirely sure. All I know is that video is one of the new fun features of html5 :)
